document.discussion_title: BNP Paribas Reiterates “Neutral” Rating for Dcc Plc (DCC)
document.topic_text: Tweet Dcc Plc (LON:DCC) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating reissued by analysts at BNP Paribas in a research report issued to clients and investors on Monday. They currently have a GBX 6,400 ($82.41) price target on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price target would suggest a potential downside of 10.49% from the stock’s current price. DCC has been the topic of several other reports. Barclays PLC raised shares of Dcc Plc to an “overweight” rating and increased their price target for the company from GBX 5,296 ($68.19) to GBX 7,800 ($100.44) in a research note on Wednesday, August 17th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. increased their price objective on shares of Dcc Plc from GBX 6,124 ($78.86) to GBX 6,744 ($86.84) and gave the company an “overweight” rating in a report on Wednesday, May 18th. Morgan Stanley started coverage on shares of Dcc Plc in a report on Wednesday, April 27th. They issued an “overweight” rating and a GBX 7,800 ($100.44) price objective on the stock. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. started coverage on shares of Dcc Plc in a report on Thursday, June 2nd. They issued a “neutral” rating and a GBX 6,500 ($83.70) price objective on the stock. Finally, Goodbody restated a “hold” rating on shares of Dcc Plc in a report on Friday, June 10th. Five equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and seven have issued a buy rating to the stock. The company presently has an average rating of “Buy” and an average price target of GBX 6,764.09 ($87.10). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/bnp-paribas-reiterates-neutral-rating-for-dcc-plc-dcc/ Dcc Plc ( LON:DCC ) opened at 7100.00 on Monday. Dcc Plc has a 12-month low of GBX 4,522.72 and a 12-month high of GBX 8,029.92. The stock’s market capitalization is GBX 6.29 billion. The stock’s 50 day moving average is GBX 6,787.86 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 6,231.09. Receive News & Ratings for Dcc Plc Dcc Plc
